example.name: they're all like this??
example.text: Meanwhile, bond investors are laboring under the onus of a national debt ceiling debate.
example.arg: under the onus of a national debt ceiling debate

roleset.note: I will be curious to see if this verb occurs in any other contexts (ie, other than "labor under").

predicate.note: Frames file for 'labor' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: Give birth

example.name: Manner example
example.text: After [PRO] laboring prematurely, I spent 3 months in bed.
